snippet.title: Johnny Depp accuses Amber Heard of having extra-marital relationship with Elon Musk
snippet.description:
New Delhi, March 02 (ANI): Even after settling the divorce Johnny Depp  has now accused Amber Heard of beginning a romantic relationship with Elon Musk, founder of Tesla, within one month into their marriage. The latest claims come from the actor's defamation lawsuit against Heard, via which he has to pay $50 million in damages after she wrote an op-ed in which she revealed that Depp domestically abused her. The former Hollywood couple settled their divorce in 2017 and Depp agreed to pay around 7 million USD, however, Heard ended up donating the money to a charity. They even issued a joint statement during the time of their divorce, saying, "Our relationship was intensely passionate and at times volatile, but always bound by love. Neither party has made false accusations for financial gain. There was never any intent of physical or emotional harm.”
